sourcesContent:
import { useEffect } from "react" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { deleteC, getallC } from "../axios/categoryAxios" import { deleteCategory, loadCategory } from "../redux/actions/categoryAction" export const ListCategory = () => { let lcat = useSelector(k => k.datareducerc.category) let md = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { if (lcat != null && lcat.length == 0) { getallC() .then((x) => md(loadCategory(x.data))) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) } }, []) const remo=(id)=>{ debugger deleteC(id) .then((x) => md(deleteCategory(x._id))) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); getallC() .then((x) => md(loadCategory(x.data))) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) } return {lcat.map((x, i) => (<> ))}
קוד הקטגוריה שם הקטגוריה
{x._id} {x.NameCategory}
}
